author: Wayne Cole
title: Asia shares make cautious gains, investors eye China PMI
description: Asian share markets managed a tentative rally on Tuesday after European and U.S. equities stabilized, though buying for month and quarter-end book balancing likely flattered the gains.
content:
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Asian share markets managed a tentative rally on Tuesday after European and U.S. equities stabilized, though buying for month and quarter-end book balancing likely flattered the gains.
